snippet: The 14-year-old impersonated a terrorist in a Twitter post to American Airlines. She was apprehended, and her folly quickly spread online.
abstract: Fourteen-year-old girl in Netherlands may face criminal charges for impersonating a terrorist on Twitter and tweeting terror threat to American Airlines.

byline.contributor: Esther de Jong contributed reporting from Amsterdam.

lead_paragraph: The 14-year-old impersonated a terrorist in a Twitter post to American Airlines. She was apprehended, and her folly quickly spread online.

headline.main: After Prank by Dutch Girl on Twitter, Real Trouble
headline.print_headline: After Prank by Dutch Girl on Twitter, Real Trouble
